name: My Friendly A.I. Assistant Robot (Demo)
description:
Demo game made with NESmaker, for the 2022 edition of Byte-Off. This demo was made in only a few weeks and it is my first NES project.

Recommended emulators:

I am providing a Mapper 30 version of the rom as well as a "unrom hack" version, which can run on older emulators. Choose whichever emulator you want. If you choose Mesen, I would recommend using NTSC filters so the image looks more like "the real thing".

You can also use a Everdrive cartridge and play it on a real Nintendo.

How to launch the game:

- Choose your favourite emulator
- Launch My Friendly A.I. Assistant Robot (Demo).nes

Controls:

UP: A
Shoot: B
Skip level: Select

Known issues:

- If you get hurt in the flying shooter level, this will probably force you to reset the console (avoid dying)
- The player character sprite will change for something else briefly
- Lasers can get stuck in place
